sentence: The Delivery Drone hovers near, its lens flickerin...
scene_context: Dawn, delivery hub at the eastern edge of Neo-Forest Colony. Mist clings to the mossy ground, and the air smells faintly of ozone and pine sap. The hum of distant patrol bots mixes with the rhythmic whirr of sorting conveyors. The cracked concrete platform is damp beneath Red’s boots, and blinking hazard lights reflect off the metal bark of nearby synth-trees.
